title: Staff of Crones
content:
cy before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

Live worms wriggle beneath the crumbling surface of this half-rotten staff. Merely touching it fills you with a wave of unbearable nausea and a strange longing, as if it's calling for its like.

Staff of Crones Location & Where to Find

Location: Can be found at Sunlit Wetlands, in the Hag treasure room (Ancient Abode). Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Dropped by:

Staff of Crones Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 10
